::Decadel::

     Decadel was ready to start what he had been waiting to do=
 for a long time.

      "Yes.....My huge underground lair.....will no long=
er be.....a lair.  It shall be, a base!  A base for my troops to gather, an=
d talk, and make plans.  A headquarters for my army!  Now, I must go assemb=
le my army!" Decadel said to himself.

      Decadel exited his underground=
 lair, and brought a bunch of his, recently improved, robotic worm devices,=
 to force bots to go on his side if they didn't want to join him.  Decadel =
had to pick out worthy-looking bots.  First, he needed an obedient advisor,=
 to help him become a good leader.  Decadel headed towards the CF.
